Mike Kipruto Kigen (amụrụ na 15 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na mita 5000 na mita 10,000 ma nweta ọlaọcha na ihe omume abụọ ahụ na African Championships in Athletics na 2006 na-anọchite anya Kenya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Kaan Kigen Özbilen ma kemgbe ahụ na-asọ mpi maka Turkey.
A mụrụ Kigen na Keiyo District
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005 na Simotwo High School na Ainabkoi, Keiyo South District ebe ọ nọchitere anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na asọmpi dị iche iche
Ọ nọ na ogige ọzụzụ PACE Sports Management na Kaptagat.
Afọ ọganihu Kigen bịara na 2006 mgbe ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na mba ụwa na asọmpi atọ
Ọ bụ onye nke ise na 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke mere ka ya na ndị Kenya nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi otu
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 12:58.58 na mita 5000 na egwuregwu Bislett na Oslo wee bụrụ onye mmeri mba n'ebe dị anya.

Nke a mere ka a họpụta ya maka 2006 African Championships in Athletics na Bambous, ebe o nwetara ọlaọcha n'ebe kachasị amasị ya tupu ọ gaa merie ọlaọcha ọzọ site na nke kachasị mma nke 28:03.70 na ihe omume mita 10,000

O nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na 2006 IAAF World Athletics Final, na-ewere nke asaa na 5000 m, mana ụdị egwu ya laghachiri na 2006 IA AF World Cup ka ọ na-ewere ọlaọcha nke abụọ ya na 5000 m nke afọ na-anọchite anya Africa
Ọrụ ya mebiri na ngwụcha oge ahụ site na mmerụ ahụ siri ike n'ikpere na Nọvemba.
Ọ laghachiri na asọmpi n'afọ 2007, mana ọ bụ n'afọ 2008 ka ọ malitere ịlaghachi n'ụdị ya
O meriri na Great Capital Run na Julaị 2008, na-edekọ ihe ndekọ nke nkeji 28:42
Na 2008 IAAF World Athletics Final ọ gbara ọsọ na mita 3000 wee bụrụ onye nke anọ
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gara 2009 IAAF World Athletics Final (mbipụta ikpeazụ nke ihe omume ahụ) ma bụrụ nke iri na otu karịa 5000 m.

Ọ malitere oge ịgba ọsọ na 2010 nke ọma, site na mmeri na nzukọ ikike IAAF Antrim International Cross Country na Crosse Oeust-France. O sochiri nke a site na mmeri ọzọ na San Sebastián Cross Country mana a họrọghị ya maka ndị otu Kenya maka 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships
O setịpụrụ nke kacha mma nke 28:09 karịa kilomita 10 na ọsọ Parelloop na Brunssum na Machị, na-abịa nke anọ n'azụ Berhanu Delale

Ọ gbara ọsọ na Grand 10 Berlin n'ọnwa Ọktoba wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'ihe gbasara Kenya, jiri ihe kachasị mma nke 27:25 maka 10K. Ọ laghachiri na sekit cross country na Nọvemba, na-ewere nke atọ na Tuskys Cross Country zutere na Kenya na Cross de l'Acier na France. O merikwara na Antrim na Jenụwarị na-esote, na-ejigide aha ya.

A gụnyeghị ya na ndị otu Kenya World Cross Country ma gbaa ọsọ nke mbụ ya na ọkara marathon kama na Lisbon Half Marathon, na-abịa nke ise na oge 1:00:49. Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Micah Kogo na Parelloop n'ọnwa Eprel. O sonyere na 2011 IAAF Diamond League circuit, mana ọ gwụbeghị karịa nke asaa

Otú ọ dị, o setịpụrụ 10,000 m kacha mma nke 27:30.53 nkeji na Memorial Van Damme. Kigen dabara n'okpuru akara awa maka oge mbụ na Delhi Half Marathon, na oge ya nke 59:58 nkeji bụ naanị otu sekọnd n'azụ onye mmeri Lelisa Desisa.
Ọ malitere 2012 site na mmeri nke atọ ya na Antrim na mmeri ọrụ nke abụọ na Cross de San Sebastián Ọ bịara nke atọ na Azkoitia-Azpeitia Half Marathon na nke abụọ na Würzburger Residenzlauf
Ọ gbalịrị inweta nhọpụta maka 2012 London Olympics, mana o mechara nke iri na 10,000 m ule na Prefontaine Classic na nke ise na Kenyan 5000 m ule
Ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya nke nkeji 27:03.49 bịara na Memorial Van Damme
Njem ikpeazụ ya n'afọ ahụ bụ njedebe nke anọ na Great North Run
Kigen mere nke mbụ ya na marathon na Jenụwarị 2013, na-abịa nke asatọ na Dubai Marathon na oge nke 2:08:24 awa.
Na 2014 Great North Run Kigen duziri ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ, Mo Farah gafere ya na 300m ikpeazụ
Ndị egwuregwu abụọ ahụ mechara na 59:59.

Àtụ:S-ach
